title: Decades of forest loss hit home: Future cyclones could batter Indonesia harder, analysts warn
snippet: Deadly floods and landslides across Sumatra have become the first major climate test for President Prabowo.

title: Why the Philippines’ anti-flood control corruption movement could be receding
snippet:
Thousands of Filipinos have taken to the streets again to protest against the ongoing flood control corruption scandal, yet the markedly smaller crowds compared with the last major demonstration have sparked fears that the movement may be losing momentum.
Political analysts said the low turnout on Sunday reflected a combination of fatigue and disillusionment among activists in the Philippines. They warned that if public mobilisation continued to thin, it could ease the pressure on President...

title: US defence chief says he did not see survivors before follow-up boat strike
snippet: US Secretary of Defense Peter Hegseth defends controversial second strike on alleged drug boat in the Caribbean Sea.

title: South Korea’s Lee says on martial law anniversary perpetrators must face justice
snippet: The attempt to impose martial law threatened to deal an irreparable setback to the country, he said.

title: Polarised South Korea marks martial law anniversary
snippet: On Dec 3, 2024, Yoon suspended civilian rule for the first time in more than four decades.

title: Barcelona extend lead at top of La Liga with 3-1 win over Atletico Madrid
snippet: Barca recover from a goal down to win, with strikes from Raphinha, Dani Olmo and Ferran Torres.

title: US Navy admiral ordered second  deadly Venezuela boat strike, White House says
snippet: The strikes, authorised by Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, have raised fresh legality questions - but the White House says laws have been followed.

title: Bulgaria ditches budget plan after tens of thousands join protests
snippet: Demonstrators said the plan - the country's first in euros - attempted to hide widespread government corruption.

title: Pavarotti statue frozen knee-deep in ice rink strikes wrong note in Italy
snippet: The opera legend's widow said the town had made an "absurd decision" after it also encouraged skaters to high five the statue.
